T02D1246:194b-1: sa ha dza sa yo ga kra ma n'a ma /
T02D1246:194b-3: lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1246:194b-4: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1246:194b-5: dgyes rdor rgyu mthun dang bcas dam pa ni //
T02D1246:194b-6: rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lor rab btud de //
T02D1246:194b-7: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su ji lta bar /
T02D1246:195a-2: mkha' dbyings bha gar bsams nas ni //
T02D1246:195a-3: dbus su bsgom par bya ba ste //
T02D1246:195a-5: lha rnams ji ltar byung ba'o //
T02D1246:195a-6: zhes bya ba mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1246:195a-8: gnas la byed pa zhugs nas ni //
T02D1246:195a-9: sgrub pa pos ni bya ba bya //
T02D1246:195a-11: de yi rgyu mthun he ru ka'o //
T02D1246:195a-12: zhes bya ba la bskyed pa'i phyogs su dag pa
T02D1246:195a-13: bzhi gang yin pa de rnams las gsum pa dang
T02D1246:195a-15: dga' bral las gong ma gang yin pa de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste /
T02D1246:195a-16: de nyid 'dir ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02D1246:195a-18: gcig ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1246:195a-19: gzhan ni zla ba rdzogs pa bzhin //
T02D1246:195a-20: de dag las ni mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02D1246:195a-21: gang de skyob pa chos sku yin //
T02D1246:195a-22: gang zhig zla ba rdzogs 'dra ba //
T02D1246:195a-23: de ni longs spyod rdzogs sku'o //
T02D1246:195a-25: gang zhig ye shes gnyis su med //
T02D1246:195a-26: ji ltar mthar ni bde ba che //
T02D1246:195a-27: de bzhin thog mar tha mi dad //
T02D1246:195a-28: de ni chos kun rang bzhin dang //
T02D1246:195a-29: de ni gnyis med yi shes yin //
T02D1246:195a-30: de ni bde chen de yi phyir //
T02D1246:195a-31: 'gro ba thams cad de bzhin no //
T02D1246:195a-32: 'di'i mngon par rtogs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1246:195a-33: sgom pa 'di la dbang byed pa ni /
T02D1246:195a-34: dpa' bo gcig pu dben par gnas pa /
T02D1246:195a-36: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par shes nges par byas la /
T02D1246:195a-37: bdag nyid he ru kar mos shing yid kyis gang yang rung ba bkug ste /
T02D1246:195a-38: de nyid bdag med mar mos te /
T02D1246:195a-39: kakko lar po la'i rol pa 'am yang na bo
T02D1246:195a-40: la'i bu gar rang gi snying ga dang lte ba
T02D1246:195a-41: las byung ba'i thabs shes rab kyi rnam par rol
T02D1246:195a-42: pa bsgom zhing / bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis don dam pa mngon par phyogs par bya'o //
T02D1246:195a-43: ji ltar mngon par phyogs par byas pa /
T02D1246:195a-45: yan lag dang nying lag dang /
T02D1246:195a-46: phyogs bcu'i dngos po thams cad la spro bar bya'o //
T02D1246:195a-47: snang ba med cing gsal ba tsam //
T02D1246:195a-48: bde ba chen po mtha' yas pa //
T02D1246:195a-49: ji srid nus pa de srid du //
T02D1246:195a-50: rgyun ma chad par blta bar bya //
T02D1246:195a-51: langs pa dang dngos po thams cad bde ba chen
T02D1246:195a-52: po'i rang bzhin yin pas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i
T02D1246:195b-0: @195b bdag nyid can mos par bya'o //
T02D1246:195b-1: yang dag yang du myur du bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1246:195b-2: rang rig pa'i bde ba chen po de nyid kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1246:195b-3: tshogs bsags pa'i bsgom pa'i khyad par gyis yun ring
T02D1246:195b-4: ma yin par 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro
T02D1246:195b-5: ; / srog chags thams cad bdag las byung //
T02D1246:195b-6: khams gsum yang ni bdag las byung //
T02D1246:195b-7: 'di dag thams cad bdag gis khyab //
T02D1246:195b-8: 'gro gzhan rang bzhin mi snang ngo //
T02D1246:195b-9: de ltar shes nas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1246:195b-10: mnyam par gzhag pa gang slob pa //
T02D1246:195b-11: mi de bsod nams dman pa yang //
T02D1246:195b-12: grub par 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02D1246:195b-13: yang na mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor yang yang ldang ba'i rnal 'byor te /
T02D1246:195b-14: rnal 'byor gnyis po ni nus pa ji lta ba
T02D1246:195b-15: bzhin du chu bo'i rgyun bzhin nam rgyu ba mar
T02D1246:195b-16: me'i snang ba'i rgyun bzhin du /
T02D1246:195b-17: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1246:195b-18: nyin dang mtshan du gnas par bya //
T02D1246:195b-19: rang gi rig pa'i ye shes 'di //
T02D1246:195b-20: ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul 'das //
T02D1246:195b-21: de ni byin brlab rim pa ste //
T02D1246:195b-22: kun mkhyen ye shes de rang bzhin //
T02D1246:195b-23: sa dang chu dang me dang ni //
T02D1246:195b-24: rlung dang mkha' rnams nyid dag dang //
T02D1246:195b-25: rang bzhin rig pas kun rig la //
T02D1246:195b-26: skad cig de kun gnod mi 'gyur //
T02D1246:195b-27: mtho ris sa bla sa 'og tu //
T02D1246:195b-28: skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur //
T02D1246:195b-29: rang bzhin dbye ba'i rtog pa yis //
T02D1246:195b-30: de ni gnod par mi nus so //
T02D1246:195b-31: rnal 'byor 'di ni gnas skabs kyi dbye ba dang //
T02D1246:195b-32: thabs kyi dbye bas rnam pa bzhi yin te /
T02D1246:195b-38: dngos grub kyis sngon du sprin lta bu ste /
T02D1246:195b-39: srab pa'i sprin gyis bkab pa'i zla ba rdzogs pa bzhin du mi gsal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1246:195b-40: grub na sgyu ma lta bu ste /
T02D1246:195b-41: yid kyis sprul pa'i rig ma'i stobs kyis gsal bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1246:195b-42: de nas rmi lam dang 'dra ba ste //
T02D1246:195b-43: bo la'i yi ge rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis rnal
T02D1246:195b-44: 'byor gyi gnyid log pa la cig car du skye
T02D1246:195b-45: ba'i phyir ro // de nas rmi lam dang sad pa lta bu yin pa la /
T02D1246:195b-46: ji ltar sad pa lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1246:195b-47: phyi rol gyi rig ma'i sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1246:195b-48: rmi lam lta bu'i rgyu ci lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1246:196a-1: dag mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1246:196a-2: de dag kyang gong nas gong du khyad par du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
T02D1246:196a-3: snga ma dang snga ma'i stobs kyis phyi ma dang phyi ma skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1246:196a-4: ji ltar tha ma thams cad kyi mchog ce na /
T02D1246:196a-5: g-yeng ba yod na yang shin tu mnyam par ma
T02D1246:196a-6: bzhag pa'i phyir dam tshig ma lus pa yod pa'i
T02D1246:196a-7: phyir ro // shin tu zab pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje las //
T02D1246:196a-8: lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba bsdus nas ni //
T02D1246:196a-9: dge ba gang zhig bdag gis nyer bsags pa //
T02D1246:196a-10: des ni 'gro ba rdo rje 'dzin thob shog /
T02D1246:196a-11: lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor dam pa slob dpon
T02D1246:196a-12: chen po dpal rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal
T02D1246:196a-13: snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
